text: Gumazim dagɨabar gara navim dɨkava egha arazir igharagha garir kurabar amuasa, kamaghɨn a uan adarazi osɨmtɨzim me ganɨngi. Ezɨ gumazitam, gumazir igharaziba arazir kurabar amuasa anepezepera dagɨaba a danɨngasa, ezɨ gumazir kam ghaze, “Puvatɨ, kɨ ian dagɨar kaba inian aghua,” kamaghɨn gumazir kam deraghvɨra ikɨvɨra ikiam.
